page.title: 10A day in the life of Ben B.
page.content: {A typical day for me would be to get {up about 7.30,get dressed and have my {breakfast.Then at 8.30 I leave my {house with my brother for {school.School starts at 8.55.First we {have assemmbly except for Thursday {when we have a U.S.S.R which stands {for Untimed Silent Sustained Read. {Next Mr.Harvey(our teacher)reads us a {story about people who spent their {lives helping other people.Next it's {play time.I play with {Joanne,Christopher,Kerry,Robert and {Marie.After play it's maths.Then it's {dinner time.Some dinners I can't {stand.But some are quite nice.When I {get home I do programmes on my {computer. { }
